extendedInfo.description: The business news experience youâve been waiting for is finally here! The State Journal is the premiere business news leader for West Virginia. Now you can get the latest business news, opinions, and weather wherever you go with the State Journal Mobile Business News application. Mobile Business News brings the best of the State Journal straight to your mobile device. It makes viewing and sharing the latest business news easy. With a few steps, you can get the latest news and share it with friends and family by e-mail, text message and even Twitter and Facebook. Whether itâs the latest Government news or breaking business news, the State Journal Mobile Business News application keeps you in-the-know while youâre on-the-go. The new StateJournal.com app includes: - Latest Business News - Upfront, Government, Business, and Legal News - West Virginia Tonight Live News - Decision Makers News - StormTracker Weather Forecasts - Current conditions that change automatically based on your location. - Intuitive, patent-pending navigation - Submit your news pictures and videos to the State Journal right from the app - Easy news sharing by e-mail, text message and post to Twitter and Facebook - And moreâ¦ Designed and developed in partnership with DoApp, Inc., best in class in mobile phone development, and Inergize Digital, the media industryâs leading provider of content management solutions, Web sites and interactive technology for television stations and other media companies, the Mobile Local News application makes it easy for media companies to distribute news and information to the mobile masses.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Keeps me up to date on the Mountain State
reviews.author: Anthony Hill

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Great way to find out business throughout the state!
reviews.author: Patrick Greene

reviews.title: Requires too many permissions.
reviews.comment: Requires way too many permissions for a simple news app. Removing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The developer should state this is only for West Virginia area. Otherwise great application.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It found my location in California but only seems to give news for west Virginia.
reviews.author: A Google User
